text: The Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic (Latvian SSR; ; , Latviyskaya Sovetskaya Sotsialisticheskaya Respublika), also known as Soviet Latvia or Latvia, was part of the Soviet Union, and existed from 1918 to 1920, and from 1940 to 1990. title: Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic
